TestReportSteps.testObjective: Verify that user is able to edit Crash Cost CBA Configuration.
TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Click on Crash Cost Configuration Tab.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click on Crash Cost Configuration Tab.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click on Crash Cost Configuration Tab.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click on Crash Cost Configuration Tab.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to select Year.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to select Year.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to select Year.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to enter slight crash cost.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to enter slight crash cost.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to enter slight crash cost.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to enter serious crash cost.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to enter serious crash cost.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to enter serious crash cost.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to enter fatal crash cost.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to enter fatal crash cost.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to enter fatal crash cost.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to enter damage only cost.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to enter damage only cost.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to enter damage only cost.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click Save button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click Save button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click Save button.

TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Verify that user is able to edit Crash Cost CBA Configuration.Capture screenshot
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to edit Crash Cost CBA Configuration.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to edit Crash Cost CBA Configuration.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to edit Crash Cost CBA Configuration.
